name: quiz-nghiep-vu
description: Quiz application for professional skills testing

scripts.optimize: npm run compress && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --minify-css true --minify-js true index.html -o index.min.html && mv index.min.html index.html
scripts.build: npm run convert && npm run optimize
